title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer currently stores the absolute path. This should be changed to store the relative path instead.
OB: Currently, I can see that the report design stores the absolute path of the library as <propertyname='fileName'/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: The report design should store the relative path of the library instead of the absolute path.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Create a report design in the folder $project/test.
2. Include a library from the folder $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary in the report design.
3. Check the properties of the included library and verify that it is storing the relative path correctly.
